about-radio.legend: What would you like to contact us about?

type-radio.legend: What type of certificate did you order?

existing-radio.legend: Is your complaint about an existing order?

previous-radio.legend: Have you already complained about this issue?

person-text.label: Whose name, including any initials, is on the certificate you received?

person-one.label: Tell us the full names of party one on the certificate you requested

person-two.label: Tell us the full names of party two on the certificate you requested (optional)

additional-text.label: What else would you like to tell us about your enquiry?

additional-radio.legend: Have you previously been in contact about this enquiry?

how-radio.legend: How did you place your order?

online-toggle-text.label: What is your COL number?
online-toggle-text.hint: A COL number is a Certificate Online number that is sent in the confirmation email when certificates are ordered online. COL numbers typically look like this COL123456/2015

telephone-toggle-text.label: What is the account number?
telephone-toggle-text.hint: The account number will have been given to you when you placed your order by telephone. Account numbers aways start with HMPO and typically look like this HMPO45678ERF0. If you can't find your account number, you may have to send us a copy of the certificate.

post-toggle-text.label: What is the account number?
post-toggle-text.hint: The account number will have been given to you when you placed your order by post. Account numbers aways start with HMPO and typically look like this HMPO45678ERF0. If you can't find your account number, you may have to send us a copy of the certificate.

which-radio.legend: Which service did you pay for?

order-number-text.label: What is the order number?
order-number-text.hint: Your order number would have been given to you when you ordered by telephone. Order numbers typically look like this 12345-1

when-date.legend: When did you place your order?

email-text.label: What is your email address?
email-text.hint: If you placed your order online, you should use the same email address
